tool_description: Creates and formats survey content optimized for different distribution channels, ensuring consistent messaging across email, SMS, web, and mobile formats.

survey_description.description: Brief description of the survey purpose

target_channels.description: Channels where survey will be distributed

error_messages: Missing required content: survey_title and survey_description must be provided and non-empty.
Invalid target channels: Use supported channels [email, sms, web, mobile_push].
Content too long: Survey title must be under 100 characters, description under 500 characters.
Invalid duration: estimated_duration must be between 1 and 60 minutes.
usage: Provide survey_title, survey_description, and target_channels. The tool will create channel-optimized content versions with consistent messaging but appropriate formatting for each channel.

content_id.description: Unique identifier for the created content

channel_versions.description: List of channels with formatted content versions

content_preview.description: Preview of the main survey content
